ShortDescription.Value: Earn achievements naturally even with mods enabled. Keeps the backend on, Enjoy :)

Publish.LongDescription:
Achievement Fixer keeps the CS2 achievements active even when you have mods.
**How it works** - Automatically re-enables achievements after a city loads. - Stops the in-game warning ("Achievements are disabled because of mods"). - Uses the game’s own localization to show friendly achievement names. - Just having the mod installed allows you to earn achievements natually if you want the challenge. - If you want faster, see the Advanced tab.
**Advanced tab** - [Unlock Selected] marks a chosen achievement as completed. - [Clear Selected] resets one achievement (back to not completed). - [Debug: Reset All] wipes out all achievements (useful for testing). If you click this by accident, just use [Unlock Selected] to restore them.
Supports 10 languages: - English, Français (French), Deutsch (German), Español (Spanish), Italiano (Italian), 日本語 (Japanese) - 한국어 (Korean), Tiếng Việt (Vietnamese), Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese). - Future updates may add more languages.
**Notes** - Some achievements shown on Steam are not available until DLC's are released (e.g., 6 from Bridges & Ports). - Safe to remove at any time; does not touch saves. - This mod does not use Reflection or Harmony, so it's safe/compatible, and less likely to break with every game update.
**Credits** - made by RiverMochi - inspired by Wayze's old Achievement Enabler (defunct) - Thanks to StarQ and the modding community for technical help and testing.
